name: Elijah Paulman
title: Computer Science & Engineering Student

about.short: Computer Science & Engineering student at The Ohio State University (3.8 GPA) with production experience at Amazon and London Computer Systems, plus leadership in sustainable tech initiatives.
about.detailed: Full-stack software engineer with experience across enterprise systems, cloud infrastructure, and scalable product catalogs. Led 20+ engineers as ESW President, won multiple J.P. Morgan hackathons, and delivered production-ready solutions with measurable impact. Passionate about leveraging technology for meaningful change.

hobbies: I enjoy playing guitar, mountain biking, skiing, kayaking, and spending time with friends and family. I also like to create cool projects on my 3D printer, and with Arduino.
